summary: I said "it depends" enough times to become Senior Engineer.
Focusing on building great building blocks for banking products.

Part of team developing a predictive analytics system for Portugal's biggest food retailer. Applied state-of-the art ML models for price sales forecasting and developed a novel methodology for price elasticity prediction. Wrote my [MSc thesis](https://repositorio-aberto.up.pt/handle/10216/128978) based on my contribution.

Received a research grant through which I joined Project [MELOA](https://www.ec-meloa.eu/)â€™s team, where I designed and developed a data stream processing application to authenticate, deliver, and load balance requests sent from IoT devices.

Invited to assist in teaching classes on Low-Level Device Drivers, and Computer Graphics. As a Teaching Assistant, led practical classes, graded assignments, and guided students in the development of their practical projects.
